Key Arguments: The proposed Misinformation Bill attacks the right to free speech.
The Bill is subjective and presents certain worldviews as facts.
Without free speech, these views cannot be challenged.
The Bill suggests a shift towards totalitarianism rather than democracy.
Notable Quotes: The proposed Misinformation Bill attacks the right to free speech which is the cornerstone of a free democratic society.
It seems that the government proposing this is becoming totalitarian, not democratic at all!
